Histogram.h

00001 #include<math.h>
00002 #include <limits>
00003 #include <iostream>
00004 #include <string>
00005 using namespace std;
00006 // A histogram class.
00007 // The Histogram object can keep a tally of values
00008 // within a range, the range is arranged into some
00009 // number of bins specified during construction.
00010 // Any allocation of a Histogram object may throw
00011 // a bad_alloc exception.
00012 class Histogram
00013 {
00014 private:
00015     double Start,nBins_by_interval;
00016     unsigned int nBins;
00017     unsigned int number;
00018     unsigned int* freq;
00019     double minValue, maxValue, mean, deviation, total;
00020 
00021 public:
00022     // Construct a histogram that can count
00023     // within a range of values.
00024     // All bins of the histogram are set to zero.
00025     Histogram(
00026               const double& Start,
00027               const double& End,
00028               const unsigned int& nBins):
00029     Start(Start),
00030     nBins_by_interval(nBins/(End-Start)),
00031     nBins(nBins),
00032     freq( new unsigned int[nBins] )
00033     {
00034         reset();
00035     }
00036     // Construct a histogram by copying another one.
00037     Histogram(const Histogram& other):
00038         Start(other.Start),
00039         nBins_by_interval(other.nBins_by_interval),
00040         nBins(other.nBins),
00041         freq( new unsigned int[nBins] )
00042     {
00043         for(unsigned int i(0); i < nBins; ++i)
00044             freq[i] = other.freq[i];
00045     }
00046     
00047     void reset() {
00048         for(unsigned int i(0); i < nBins; ++i)
00049             freq[i] = 0U;
00050         number=total=mean=deviation=0;
00051         minValue = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
00052         maxValue = std::numeric_limits<double>::min();
00053         
00054     }
00055     
00056     // Deallocate the memory that was allocated for
00057     // the tallied counts.
00058     ~Histogram() {delete[] freq;}
00059     // Set this histogram equal to another.
00060     Histogram& operator=(const Histogram& other)
00061     {
00062         if( this != &other )
00063         {
00064             Start = other.Start;
00065             nBins_by_interval = other.nBins_by_interval;
00066             if( nBins != other.nBins )
00067             {
00068                 nBins = other.nBins;
00069                 delete[] freq;
00070                 freq = new unsigned int[nBins];
00071             }
00072             for(unsigned int i(0); i < nBins; ++i)
00073                 freq[i] = other.freq[i];
00074         }
00075         return *this;
00076     }
00077     
00078     void Add(const double& x, int ntimes) {
00079         number+=ntimes;
00080         total+=(x*ntimes);
00081         mean+=(x*ntimes);
00082         deviation+= (x * x)*ntimes;
00083         minValue = min(minValue, x);
00084         maxValue = max(maxValue, x);
00085         
00086         const unsigned int i( static_cast<unsigned int>( (x-Start)*nBins_by_interval) );
00087         
00088         if( i < nBins ) {
00089             freq[i]+=ntimes;
00090         }
00091     }
00092     
00093     // Increase the count for the bin that holds a
00094     // value that is in range for this histogram.
00095     void Add(const double& x)
00096     {
00097         Add(x,1);
00098     }
00099     
00100     void end() {
00101         mean = mean / number;
00102         deviation = deviation/number - mean * mean;
00103         deviation = sqrt(deviation);
00104     }
00105     
00106     void dumpStr(ostream &outfile) {
00107         int maxfreq=0;
00108         for(unsigned int i=0; i<nBins && i<=maxValue;i++) {
00109             outfile << i << "  " << freq[i] << endl;
00110             maxfreq = freq[i]>maxfreq ? freq[i] : maxfreq;
00111         }
00112         
00113         outfile << "# Number: "<<number <<endl;
00114         outfile << "# Mean: "<<mean<<endl;
00115         outfile << "# Deviation: "<<deviation<<endl;
00116         outfile << "# Min: "<<minValue<<endl;
00117         outfile << "# Max: "<<maxValue<<endl;
00118 
00119         unsigned int max=15;
00120         for(unsigned int i=maxValue<nBins?maxValue:nBins; i>15; i--) {
00121             if(freq[i]>maxfreq/10000) {
00122                 max = i;
00123                 break;
00124             }
00125         }
00126         outfile << "# Latest: "<<max<<endl;
00127     }
00128     
00129     void dump(const char * name, const char *suffix) {
00130         string fileName(name);
00131         fileName.append(suffix);
00132         ofstream outfile;
00133         
00134         cout << "Writing histogram to: " << fileName << endl;
00135             
00136         outfile.open(fileName.c_str());
00137 
00138         dumpStr(outfile);
00139         
00140         outfile.close();
00141     }
00142     
00143     // Get the sum of all counts in the histogram.
00144     const unsigned int GetTotalCount() const
00145     {
00146         unsigned int c(0U);
00147         for( unsigned int i(0); i < nBins; ++i )
00148             c += freq[i];
00149         return c;
00150     }
00151 };
